raw_data.context:
User: Hi!
System: Hello!
User: Do you have any holiday plans for christmas?
System: Nothing much, I am going to sit back and relax at home, how about you ?
User: Same here! I would imagine spending the whole time watching movies and netflix shows. Do you have any netflix recommendations for me?
System: Netflix has great documentaries on different topics , I particularly liked wild wild country and explained, as for shows you should watch 'billions' Hope you like them!
User: oh right, already seen wild wild country. What is billions about?
System: It's based on the life of a wall street hedge fund owner, how he makes money and fights with the government when they try to destroy him. Very well made and has a good plot.
User: I have just seen 1 season of Friends I should give it another try though :) Have you seen Frasier?
System: Not yet What's it about?
User: A psychiatrist working for radio .. Great humour! its actually a spinoff from a very famous series called cheers. So people are already familiar with his character.
raw_data.prompt:
You will be given a batch of 10 samples. Each sample contains a conversation between User and a dialogue System.

Your task is to assign a float score to the sample on one metric.

You should carefully horizontally compare the given samples in order to assign a suitable float score to each sample.

Please make sure you read and understand these instructions carefully. Please keep this document open while reviewing, and refer to it as needed.


Evaluation Criteria:

Understanding (floating point numbers within the interval [1,3]): Does the system seem to understand the user?
- A float score near 1 (not understanding) means that the system completely fails to understand the user's needs or questions. This could be manifested as the system providing answers that are irrelevant to the user's question, or the system's response completely deviating from the topic.
- A float score near 2 (somewhat understanding) means the system's response is partially correct or related to the question, but does not fully answer the user's question.
- A float score near 3 (very understanding) means that the system fully understands the user's needs or question, and provides an accurate, relevant answer.

System: Hello!

System: Netflix has great documentaries on different topics , I particularly liked wild wild country and explained, as for shows you should watch 'billions' Hope you like them!
User: oh right, already seen wild wild country. What is billions about?
System: It's based on the life of a wall street hedge fund owner, how he makes money and fights with the government when they try to destroy him. Very well made and has a good plot.
User: I have just seen 1 season of Friends I should give it another try though :) Have you seen Frasier?
System: Not yet What's it about?
User: A psychiatrist working for radio .. Great humour! its actually a spinoff from a very famous series called cheers. So people are already familiar with his character. 

Sample2:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: nice to meet you! what are you up to?
System: It's nice meeting you too I am talking to you on the internet.
User: haha yea, are you doing something else beside talking to me?
System: I'm glad you got a laugh out of it. The only thing I am doing is talking to you and a few other people. "I am talking to you on the internet."? haha yea, are you doing something else beside talking to me??
User: okay so you're talking to a few people, are they interesting? and why did you repeat what I said?
System: Yeah okay, You are a few people are they interesting? Is that your job? Just in case you didn't hear me the first time.
User: hmm, what is my job?
System: I see you are one of those people who writes "Hmm" with 2 m's. You didn't tell me, so I will guess that you work with computers.
User: yes I'm a computer scientist and what are the other ways that people can write Hmm?
System: Wow! Maybe you can give my Mousebreaker a job. Your job is what are the other ways that people can write Hmm.
User: okie System, your rules don't seem to work very well
System: What about my rules do not work WELL?
User: alright. I gotta go. ttyl!

Sample3:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hiii! How are you?
User: I am good
System: That's good! What are you up to today?
User: I am trying to get my work done
System: How's that going so far?
User: like is fun
System: That's good! What are you supposed to be doing right now?
User: Helping collect some data for training models.
System: Ooh, what kind of training models?
User: Models that will help improve tools for our users.
System: Ooh, that sounds like a good job!
User: Thank you, that's for sure
System: You're welcome! How long until you're done with training models?
User: We keep on trying to improve them so I guess it'll be a while

Sample4:

Conversation History:

System: Currently unpacking it I guess. How's your morning?

System: I think I traveled too much the last couple of months so no holiday for me. But I'm okay with that. Going anywhere exciting?
User: Yes
System: Where to?
User: Hawaii... looking forward to warm beaches.

Sample5:

Conversation History:

System: Awesome! Is this the first time you are diving?
User: Yes. I'm feeling a little trepidatious. Have you done it before?

Sample10:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey! How are you today?
User: Good! Have you seen the movie 'The Iron Giant', it's one my favorite movies
System: Yes! I love that movie!
User: it's the best. Which part do you like the most?
System: Honestly, I love the whole movie.
User: Brad Bird is an amazing director. I worked with him on "Incredibles 2"
System: Really? That's awesome! What do you do?
User: I"m a REDACTED_TERM and REDACTED_TERM. I basically help design the characters that you see in the movies
System: That's awesome! That's pretty cool.
User: yup! Maybe one day you can be one of those cool characters yourself!
System: That would be the coolest.

System: I want to own my own business.
User: cool! what kind?
System: An art gallery or bookstore.
User: My mom had a similar dream. Of owning a coffee shop somewhere in Mexico
System: That would be nice. I like coffee.
User: She loves people and a place where they can get together
System: That's very sweet. What does she do?
User: Currently she's a real-estate agent
System: That's very interesting. Does she enjoy being a real estate agent?
